item.title: Hubble on Twitter: "A pulse of intense radiation swept through our solar system that astronomers called the BOAT: the brightest of all time. Several @NASA missions, including Hubble, have followed up to study this gamma-ray burst, likely caused by the birth of a black hole: " / Twitter
item.description: Hubble on Twitter: "A pulse of intense radiation swept through our solar system that astronomers called the BOAT: the brightest of all time. Several @NASA missions, including Hubble, have followed up to study this gamma-ray burst, likely caused by the birth of a black hole: https://t.co/zCPiiamLL8 https://t.co/xSRRLzD0dy" / Twitter https://twitter.com/NASAHubble/status/1640791835760119808

item.title: NASA Webb Telescope on Twitter: "There is beauty in transience. ðŸŒ¸ Webbâ€™s stunning image of a super bright, massive Wolf-Rayet star calls forth the ephemeral nature of cherry blossoms. The Wolf-Rayet phase is a fleeting stage that only some stars go through, soon before they explode: " / Twitter
item.description: NASA Webb Telescope on Twitter: "There is beauty in transience. ðŸŒ¸ Webbâ€™s stunning image of a super bright, massive Wolf-Rayet star calls forth the ephemeral nature of cherry blossoms. The Wolf-Rayet phase is a fleeting stage that only some stars go through, soon before they explode: https://t.co/ZOAmKgtshI https://t.co/fC0tL24iUe" / Twitter https://twitter.com/NASAWebb/status/1635702851270766592

item.title: Hubble on Twitter: "A million-second exposure. 10,000 galaxies. One mind-blowing image. The Hubble Ultra Deep Field image unveiled a powerful, deep view of our universe #OTD in 2004. This image only covers the amount of sky you can see through an eight-foot-long soda straw: " / Twitter
item.description: Hubble on Twitter: "A million-second exposure. 10,000 galaxies. One mind-blowing image. The Hubble Ultra Deep Field image unveiled a powerful, deep view of our universe #OTD in 2004. This image only covers the amount of sky you can see through an eight-foot-long soda straw: https://t.co/zaMJELUaJz https://t.co/xbvxPFQPKn" / Twitter https://twitter.com/NASAHubble/status/1633853586349207552

item.title: NASA Webb Telescope on Twitter: "Triples is best. This Webb image features a special galaxy that appears 3 times. Why? There's a galaxy cluster here whose mass and gravity are so great that time and space around it gets warped. This magnifies, multiplies, and distorts galaxies behind it: " / Twit
item.description: NASA Webb Telescope on Twitter: "Triples is best. This Webb image features a special galaxy that appears 3 times. Why? There's a galaxy cluster here whose mass and gravity are so great that time and space around it gets warped. This magnifies, multiplies, and distorts galaxies behind it: https://t.co/ftRTPC4bDr https://t.co/fzTjUGc5UO" / Twitter https://twitter.com/NASAWebb/status/1630591812204109832
